Name: Save the Llama
About the game: Assemble advanced towers from old farm equipment, mechanize the landscape, and erect an impenetrable perimeter to defend your herd. Construct your towers on moving platforms and orchestrate their position and timing to defeat waves of alien UFOs. Craft the perfect defense and save your llamas from the alien menace! Features An assortment of moving mechanisms for you to experiment with to your strategic delight. Six unique upgrade-able towers to build your defenses from. 10 enemy types with different abilities to defeat. Perks to improve and specialize your play style. 16 unique levels to master. Playful acapella sound effects and voice acting. Full save and load, never lose progress when you need to step away. Fast forward, slow, and pause time as you see fit.
